api_endpoints.description: GET: List of Projects funding directorate options using optional 'search' parameter
PATCH: overwrite Projects funding directorates when found in request body

key_value_pairs.Directorate for Computer and Information: Directorate for Computer and Information Science and Engineering
key_value_pairs.Directorate for Mathematical and Physica: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
key_value_pairs.Directorate for Social, Behavioral and E: Directorate for Social, Behavioral and Economic Sciences
